about_the_game:
Now you are traped in a maze and you should find the exit.During the process,pay attention to all kinds of obstacles and signboards indicating the wrong,oppsite direction.

The inspiration of this game derive from a game we students played with our PE teacher In childhood. In this game,the teacher stands in front of students face to face,when the teacher point to the left of students,students must run to the right at once ,when the teacher point to the right of students,students must run to the left at once ,when the teacher point to the sky ,students must squat down at once,when the teacher point to the ground ,students must jump up at once.so many years have past and many things have been forgotten,but I still the remember the joy,excitement,laughter the game brought to me.

Obstacles and signboards may appear suddenly

press A or left button to turn left

press D or right button to turn right

press W or up button to jump

press S or down button to turn left

Play Time

90-120 minutes

The inspiration of this game derive from a game we students played with our PE teacher In childhood. In this game,the teacher stands in front of students face to face,when the teacher point to the left of students,students must run to the right at once ,when the teacher point to the right of students,students must run to the left at once ,when the teacher point to the sky ,students must squat down at once,when the teacher point to the ground ,students must jump up at once.so many years have past and many things have been forgotten,but I still the remember the joy,excitement,laughter the game brought to me.

Obstacles and signboards may appear suddenly

press A or left button to turn left

press D or right button to turn right

press W or up button to jump

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Little Maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
